ygData.subject: RE: Anti-charming

ygData.messageBody:
Oh and a word of warning about evil eyes. Pre patch, I took one down
with no problem whatsoever. I had a 70 MR and ever spell it cast washed
over me. I tried it again after they made Tashan unresistable(or close
to). I had to zone this time. That is even fighting a green con eye(it
was blue risky the first time).

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Fling, Kirby [SMTP:FlingKirby@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 3:49 PM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Anti-charming
>
> From: "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...>
>
> I would not count this as consistent "cheat" without further testing.
> I
> have heard of this many times, but personally haven't been charmed but
> once,
> and that was when I first started playing the game. But I was once in
> a
> group where every person got charmed but me, the monk in the party
> tried the
> sitting trick and it successfully slowed her down. Enough that she
> didn't
> cause too many problems for the rest of the party. But I don't think
> it
> canceled the charm. I feel that further testing is required. Maybe a
> couple of people on the list with the ability to charm can try it with
> some
> friends?
>
> On a related note: On that foray against the evil eye.... The other
> 5
> people all got charmed in our group... they started attacking while I
> was
> AFK, so I got there halfway through the battle. I unloaded all my
> manna at
> the eye and successfully killed it. I got an experience message, but
> nobody
> else in the group did. My current theory is that once you are
> charmed, you
> count as a monster, and won't get the experience message for any group
> kills
> during that time. Unfortunately, this is also hard to test.
> Unfortunately
> that mishap resulted in the death of more than half our party... but
> when I
> looked at my XP-o-meter, I got a huge chunk of XP from the fight (if
> my
> theory is correct, I got all of the XP)
>
> -Kzak
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> When fighting evil eyes in the gorge the other night, I hit the sit
> button
> while charmed somehow. The result was canceling the charm, which
> allowed me
> to continue with my battle. I managed to do this repeatedly throughout
> the
> night. This could be a coincidence or an actual bug in the game, I'm
> not
> sure. Since I felt it was cheating, I quit doing it and left the
> gorge;
> after all, I only wanted another Polished Bone Bracer ;)
